name: The Lakesure RPG MAKER Demo
description:
This is the unfinished version of the Lakesure, I realized RPG Maker isn't right for this project and have decided to finish it in a more capable engine. No idea when that'll be out. Most of the puzzles are incomplete and there's very little story. This is a demo, a very, very rough one. 

SIDE NOTE: Yes, I realized I left in the instakill move, no I'm not going to remove it. There are 2 fights in this game and they suck so it doesn't matter.
